config.orimod.3d_model.tooltip: Enable full-3d model for supported items
config.orimod.glow_color.tooltip: Edge glow color for 3d models, 32-bit number in ARGB order
Max interval for double click, in ticks.
config.orimod.tools.tooltip: Config for tools, affect on all vanilla-like tools
config.orimod.tools.harvest_level.toolti: Harvest level for tools, Wood/Gold: 0, Stone: 1, Iron: 2, Diamond: 3, Cobalt (from Tinker's Construct): 4
config.orimod.tools.efficiency.tooltip: Efficiency for tools, Wood: 2, Stone: 4, Iron: 6, Diamond: 8, Gold: 12
config.orimod.tools.base_damage.tooltip: Base damage for tools, +4 for sword damage, Wood/Gold: 0, Stone: 1, Iron: 2, Diamond: 3
config.orimod.tools.enchantability.toolt: Enchantability for tools, higher for easier enchanting, Wood: 15, Stone: 5, Iron: 14, Diamond: 10, Gold: 22
config.orimod.spirit_flame.radius.toolti: Radius for spirit flame, in blocks
config.orimod.spirit_flame.targets.toolt: How many targets can spirit flame attack at the same time
config.orimod.spirit_flame.ignore_pets.t: Whether spirit flame should ignore own pets
config.orimod.spirit_flame.charge_durati: Charge duration for charge flame, in ticks
config.orimod.bash.multiplier.tooltip: Velocity multiplier for bash, affect on both player and target entity
config.orimod.bash.range.tooltip: How far can bash be acted on, in blocks
config.orimod.bash.timeout.tooltip: Max time for bash process, in ticks
config.orimod.kuros_feather.fall_multipl: Falling speed multiplier for kuro's feather gliding
config.orimod.kuros_feather.speed_compen: Gliding speed compensation for kuro's feather gliding, because sneaking can decrease speed
config.orimod.kuros_feather.length.toolt: Max forward length for kuro's feather flapping
config.orimod.kuros_feather.range.toolti: Max horizontal range for kuro's feather flapping
config.orimod.kuros_feather.force.toolti: Force for kuro's feather flapping (aka. velocity multiplier)
config.orimod.kuros_feather.cooldown.too: Cooldown for kuro's feather flapping, in ticks
config.orimod.spirit_arc.base_damage.too: Base damage for spirit arc, when velocity multiplier is 3, max damage will be about 4 times of base damage
config.orimod.spirit_arc.knockback.toolt: Base knockback for spirit arc without enchantments
config.orimod.spirit_arc.charge_duration: Charge duration for spirit arc, in ticks
config.orimod.spirit_arc.velocity_multip: Velocity Multiplier for spirit arc, affect damage along with base damage
config.orimod.light_burst.damage.tooltip: Damage to DIRECT hit entity for light burst
config.orimod.light_burst.charge_duratio: Charge duration for light burst, in ticks
config.orimod.spirit_light.drop_multipli: Drop multiplier for spirit light, multiply by max health for drop count.
config.orimod.spirit_light.death_penalty: Keep ratio for spirit light when player dies.
config.orimod.spirit_light.death_drop.to: Drop ratio for the not keeping part of spirit light, others will be disappeared.
config.orimod.jump_and_climb.tooltip: Config for multi jumping, wall jumping and climbing.
config.orimod.jump_and_climb.wall_veloci: Velocity fraction for wall jump when clinging to wall.
config.orimod.jump_and_climb.wall_fall_f: Fall distance fraction for wall jump when clinging to wall.
config.orimod.jump_and_climb.wall_threso: Max distance to wall when judged as climbing
config.orimod.stomp.charge_time.tooltip: Charge time for stomp in ticks.
